## Capitulo 1 | Sección 1


```{r}
#| eval: true
#| echo: true
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

airquality <- airquality %>% 
  mutate(
    wind_kmhr = Wind / 0.6213711922,
    temp_celsius = (Temp - 32)*5/9
  )

```



## Capitulo 1 | Sección 1

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false

ggplot(airquality, aes(temp_celsius, Ozone)) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(method = "loess")


```
